amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used for the Department of Justice's clemency initiative announced on April 23, 2014, or for Clemency Project 2014, or to transfer or temporarily assign employees to the Office of the Pardon Attorney for the purpose of screening clemency applications.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds for the Department of Justice's clemency initiative announced on April 23, 2014, or for Clemency Project 2014, or to transfer or temporarily assign employees to the Office of the Pardon Attorney for the purpose of screening clemency applications.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Marino amendment (A070) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A070) offered by Mr. Marino.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Marino amendment (A070) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
